text: @GOP He immediately corrected himself. tRump called COVID-19 a hoax, ignored experts, said it would go away with warm weather and said disinfectant would kill it. 120,000 plus dead and millions sick. The US now leads the world in COVID-19 cases. #TrumpKillsAmericans #TRUMPFAILEDUS
